title: The Dropped Stitch
content: A child refuses to cry when an adult lashes out. The moment slips sideways. Something more complex forms beneath the silence.

title: Authority Fracture
content: The adult panics at the child's emotional stability. The real rupture is visible only in the system architecture: their power depended on her tears.

title: The First Portal
content: The child's stillness becomes the first true rebellion: precision over panic. A dropped stitch becomes a doorway, not a flaw.

title: The Dropped Pattern
description: The child’s refusal to break reveals the system’s weakness and her own mythic becoming. A dropped stitch opens a portal.
